title: Mac OS 9.2 - little issue: Alias
content:
I have to admit that I didn’t work with OS 9.2 since 1875 :) ,and I have a little problem with my memory: I installed a softawre - now, how to do the alias thing? Control or Option or Cmd.... and... “I”? “C”? “M”?....

 [‹ Microsoft Word font menu preview for a Symbol font](http://web.archive.org/web/20081029010556/http:/typophile.com/node/17084 "Go to previous forum topic") [Harmonizing font names on MS Word Mac/Windows ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081029010556/http:/typophile.com/node/17086 "Go to next forum topic")
author: david hamuel

comments.content: i love that you can get tech help for anything here at typophile. way to go, miss tiff!

Thanks.

I think that I have a problem with the keyboard or something else with the G4...cmd-m not doing anything. Maybe I need to find out when Antiques Roadshow is coming to town...

\> i love that you can get tech help....

well I hope to have my AppleCare Certificate soon-oneday or night....and maybe to trade Issue per Font :)
